https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/33fr9BSvkJ6K5OvGIK2jnraXxlE.jpg After being stood up, Abbey gets inspired to open her heart in a letter, put it in a bottle and toss it out to sea. Months later, a man fishing discovers it and opts to reach out. Bottled with Love
